analyzer/src/FADC/MOctalFADCProcessRaw.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         MOctalFADCProcessRaw
00004   Created by:   Michael Murray
00005 
00006   Contents:     Module to extract TOctalFADCIsland objects from
00007                 the data banks corresponding to Fred Gray's Octal
00008                 FADC digitizer. This processes the raw data only,
00009                 making no assumptions about the attached detector,
00010                 digitization frequency, etc.
00011 
00012 \********************************************************************/
00013 
00014 /* Standard includes */
00015 #include <stdio.h>
00016 #include <stdlib.h>
00017 #include <string>
00018 #include <map>
00019 #include <utility>
00020 
00021 /* MIDAS includes */
00022 #include "midas.h"
00023 
00024 /* ROOT includes */
00025 #include <TH1.h>
00026 #include <TH2.h>
00027 
00028 /* AlCap includes */
00029 #include "TOctalFADCIsland.h"
00030 #include "TOctalFADCBankReader.h"
00031 #include "TGlobalData.h"
00032 #include "TSetupData.h"
00033 
00034 using std::string;
00035 using std::map;
00036 using std::vector;
00037 using std::pair;
00038 
00039 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00040 INT  MOctalFADCProcessRaw_init(void);
00041 INT  MOctalFADCProcessRaw(EVENT_HEADER*, void*);
00042 
00043 extern HNDLE hDB;
00044 extern TGlobalData* gData;
00045 extern TSetupData* gSetup;
00046 
00047 static TH2* hNOctalFADCIslandsReadPerBlock;
00048 
00049 static vector<TOctalFADCBankReader*> fadc_bank_readers;
00050 
00051 ANA_MODULE MOctalFADCProcessRaw_module =
00052 {
00053   "MOctalFADCProcessRaw",        /* module name           */
00054   "Michael Murray",              /* author                */

00067 INT MOctalFADCProcessRaw_init()
00068 {
00069   // This histogram has the bank names labeled on the X-axis, and the midas
00070   // block number on the Y-axis.
00071   // This uses the TH1::kCanRebin mechanism to expand automatically to the
00072   // number of FADC banks.
00073   hNOctalFADCIslandsReadPerBlock = new TH2I(
00074     "hNOctalFADCIslandsReadPerBlock",
00075     "Number of FADC Islands read by block",
00076     1,0,1, 10000,0,10000);
00077   hNOctalFADCIslandsReadPerBlock->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00078 
00079   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00080   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00081       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00082     
00083     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00084 
00085     // We only want the FADC banks here
00086     if (TSetupData::IsFADC(bankname))
00087       fadc_bank_readers.push_back(new TOctalFADCBankReader(bankname));
00088   }
00089 
00090   return SUCCESS;
00091 }
00092 
00096 INT MOctalFADCProcessRaw(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00097 {
00098   // Get the event number
00099   int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00100 
00102   // Make TPulseIsland objects for each of the TOctalFADCIslands.
00103 
00104   // Some typedefs
00105   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00106   typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00107   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00108 
00109   // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00110   // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00111   TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00112     gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00113 
00114   // Delete the islands found in the previous block. Don't clear
00115   // the map of (bank_name, vector) pairs. Once we use a bank name
00116   // once, it will have a (possibly empty) entry in this map for the
00117   // whole run.
00118   for(map_iterator iter = pulse_islands_map.begin();
00119       iter != pulse_islands_map.end(); iter++){
00120     vector<TPulseIsland*>& islands = iter->second;
00121     // Delete the pointers to TPulseIslands, then clear the vector
00122     for(unsigned int j=0; j<islands.size(); j++) {
00123       if(islands[j]) { delete islands[j]; islands[j] = NULL; }
00124     }
00125     islands.clear();
00126   }
00127 
00128   // Get islands from all banks and add them to the global structure
00129   for(unsigned int i=0; i<fadc_bank_readers.size(); i++) {
00130     string bank_name = fadc_bank_readers[i]->GetBankName();
00131 
00132     // Read the islands with the bank reader
00134     fadc_bank_readers[i]->ProcessEvent(pheader, pevent);
00135     vector<TOctalFADCIsland*> fadc_islands =
00136       fadc_bank_readers[i]->GetIslandVectorCopy();
00137 
00138     // Make vector of TPulseIsland from TOctalFADCIsland. Now this module
00139     // owns the memory associated with these.
00140     vector<TPulseIsland*> pulse_islands;
00141     for(unsigned int j=0; j<fadc_islands.size(); j++) {
00142       pulse_islands.push_back(new TPulseIsland(
00143         fadc_islands[j]->GetTime(), fadc_islands[j]->GetSampleVector(),bank_name));
00144     }
00145 
00146     // Add a pair (bank_name, vector_of_islands) to the std::map in gData
00147     pulse_islands_map[bank_name] = pulse_islands;
00148 
00149     // Fill Diagnostic histogram
00150     hNOctalFADCIslandsReadPerBlock->Fill(bank_name.c_str(), midas_event_number,
00151       fadc_islands.size());
00152 
00153     // print for testing
00154     if(midas_event_number == 1) {      
00155                   printf("TEST MESSAGE: Read %d events from bank %s in event %d\n",
00156         fadc_bank_readers[i]->GetNIslands(),
00157         fadc_bank_readers[i]->GetBankName().c_str(),
00158         midas_event_number);
00159     }
00160   }
00161 
00162   return SUCCESS;
00163 }
